mapper.select: SELECT mS.id AS subitemId, cname AS categoryName, mC.id AS categoryId, subitem_name AS subitemName, mS.semester AS semester FROM _sw_mileage_subitem AS mS INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_category AS mC ON mS.category_id = mC.id AND mS.student_input = 'Y' WHERE mS.semester = #{currentSemester} ORDER BY mS.regdate;

SELECT mR.subitem_id AS subitemId, mR.category_id AS categoryId, mS.subitem_name AS subitemName, mR.semester AS semester, mR.description1 AS description1, mR.description2 AS description2, mR.regdate AS regDate, mR.moddate AS modDate FROM _sw_mileage_record AS mR INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_student mSt ON mR.snum =mSt.num INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_subitem AS mS ON mR.subitem_id = mS.subitem_id INNER JOIN category AS mC ON mS.category_id = mC.category_id WHERE mR.semester = #{currentSemester} -- 학기 조건 AND mSt.studentId = #{studentId} -- 특정 학생 조건 AND mR.category_id = '240' -- subitem과 category 연결 AND mS.student_input = 'Y' -- student_input 조건 ORDER BY r.regdate;
